amendment.description: To codify regulations specifying that an unborn child is eligible for child health assistance.
amendment.purpose: To codify regulations specifying that an unborn child is eligible for child health assistance.

action.text: Amendment SA 80 proposed by Senator Hatch.

vote.text: Amendment SA 80 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 59. Record Vote Number: 26.
